data.name: Don't Starve Together: Forge Armor Chest
data.detailed_description:
Forge Armor Chest
Don this enduring defensive wear before you face Battlemaster Pugna’s champions to ensure the continued survival of the Survivors in the Forge. The Magmatic Armor Chest contains scorching new armor forged from volcanic slag, tempered with just a hint of dark magic.

Includes
  • Barbed Helmet
  • Clairvoyant Life Amulet
  • Feathered Grass Armor
  • Feathered Wreath
  • Jagged Grand Suit
  • Jagged Wood Armor
  • Life Blossom Garland
  • Marble Plate Armor
  • Marble Splint Mail
  • Nox Helmet
  • Silken Grand Suit
  • Silken Wood Armor
  • Steadfast Grand Suit
  • Whispering Grand Suit
  • Wood Armor
  • Woven Grass Armor

data.short_description: This chest contains all 16 Forge collection armor and headgear skin items.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
